definitions.definition: Alert , aware of what is going on, or well-informed , especially in racial and other social justice issues.
Holding progressive views or attitudes , principally with regard to social justice .
definitions.label_groups: by extension , politics , slang , often derogatory

definitions.definition: Promoting cancel culture , identitarianism , pontification , victim mentality , or virtue signalling .

main_definition: ( African-American Vernacular or slang ) Awake : conscious and not asleep.
secondary_definitions: ( originally African-American Vernacular , slang ) Alert , aware of what is going on, or well-informed , especially in racial and other social justice issues.
( by extension , politics , slang , often derogatory ) Holding progressive views or attitudes , principally with regard to social justice .
( by extension , politics , slang , derogatory ) Promoting cancel culture , identitarianism , pontification , victim mentality , or virtue signalling .
